scriptTask.name: Execute script
scriptTask.script: // Using def in Groovy makes the variable script-local // It will not be stored autmatically (which is the case when not using def) def scriptVar = "test666" execution.setVariable("myVar", scriptVar) def scriptVar1 = "test666" execution.setVariable("myVar1", scriptVar1) def scriptVar2 = "test777" execution.setVariable("my_Var2", scriptVar2)
